## üè´ Academic Context

<div class="info-card">

**Course:** Data Science I (P8105)  
**Institution:** Columbia University Mailman School of Public Health  
**Program:** MS in Biostatistics  
**Semester:** Fall 2025  
**Instructors:** Jeff Goldsmith

This project represents our capstone work, demonstrating proficiency in:

- **Data Wrangling**: Cleaning, merging, and transforming large datasets
- **Statistical Analysis**: Applying multivariate regression and hypothesis testing
- **Data Visualization**: Creating informative and aesthetically pleasing graphics
- **Reproducible Research**: Using R Markdown and version control
- **Web Development**: Building interactive dashboards with Shiny
- **Communication**: Presenting complex findings to diverse audiences

</div>
